name: Solitaire Challenge+
description:
*** Designed exclusively for superior playing experiences on AppleTV.
*** Distraction-free game-play with no GUI controls.
*** Professional graphics that look and feel great.

FEATURES
* Current game saved in iCloud
* Right or left-handed play
* Auto-complete finishes already won games.
* Undo
* Standard Klondike scoring
* Theme Packs
* Draw 1 card or Draw 3 cards
* Customizable touch pad sensitivity (Tracking speed)
* Customizable card sizes to fit your living room space ;-)
